name: Blackberry Trainwreck
description: Blackberry Trainwreck, or Blackberry Wreck, is a hybrid strain parented by two notable varieties, Blackberry Kush and Trainwreck. Led by indica genetics, Blackberry Trainwreck typically grows into chunky, dense conic buds that offer a sweet and earthy mix of berry flavors. Tension and stress melt away from the body on the exhale while the mind elevates to lighthearted positivity.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Happy, Uplifted, Energetic, Pain, Stress, Insomnia, Nausea, Depression, Dry Mouth, Dizzy
